question: International Sweet Festival to be held in ___________.
explanation: The International Sweet Festival will be hosted by Hyderabad from January 13 to 15, 2018 at the parade ground, Hyderabad. The International Sweet Festival will coincide with the International Kite festival at Hyderabad. Telangana Tourism Secretary Burra Venkatesham made this announcement. The International Sweet Festival will exhibit more than 1,000 sweets. Only homemade sweets will be displayed in the festivals.
